kDesc
Taking care of business as usual in this white pinstripe blazer, it just so happens to be after a mid-day swim. [#Legal]
Gérez vos affaires l'air de rien dans ce blazer blanc à rayures. Vous pourrez toujours aller à la piscine entre midi et deux. [#Legal]
In diesem weißen Nadelstreifen-Blazer ist man bürotauglich gekleidet, auch wenn man gerade vom mittäglichen Schwimmen kommt. [#Legal]
Al lavoro come al solito con questo blazer gessato bianco, ma solo dopo una nuotata nell'intervallo. [#Legal]
Encárgate de tus negocios con este blazer a rayas blanco después del chapuzón de mediodía. [#Legal]
하얀 핀스트라이프 블레이저를 입고 오후의 업무를 처리하세요. 물론 잠깐 수영을 즐기고 난 후에 말이죠. [#Legal]
Taking care of business as usual in this white pinstripe blazer, it just so happens to be after a mid-day swim. [#Legal]
午間暢泳之後，穿起這件白色直條西裝外套如常辦公。[#Legal]
午間暢泳之後，穿起這件白色直條西裝外套如常辦公。[#Legal]
Taking care of business as usual in this white pinstripe blazer, it just so happens to be after a mid-day swim. [#Legal]
